thread.title: Priya Mani thinks Shah Rukh Khan is the best
thread.title_full: Priya Mani thinks Shah Rukh Khan is the best - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Priya Mani thinks Shah Rukh Khan is the best
text:
Shah Rukh Khan recently made a confession on Twitter. He said that he liked nothing more than working and dancing with Kajol. He went on to add that the two of them are the "worst best dancers in the world". His tweet read, "There's nothing I like more than working. A dancing nite with Kajol even better.V r the worst best dancers in the world!!! Honest confession."
A lot of people took notice of this and corrected SRK . One of them was Amitabh Bachchan who said that they were actually the best dancers, and that he was the worst. Another was our very own Priya Mani, who echoed the Big B's sentiments. Her tweet read, "@iamsrk ..Hahahaha I beg to differ!!!please remove the "worst" and there u go..best dancers.."
